effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.
